label_income: Pre-tax annual salary in local currency:
minutes_earn: {PLAYER_NAME} earns {ANNUAL_SALARY} per year. It would take him {NUM_MINUTES} minutes on the pitch to earn your weekly salary.
minutes_earn_less_than_min: {PLAYER_NAME} earns {ANNUAL_SALARY} per year. It would take him less than a minute on the pitch to earn your weekly salary.
yearly_salary_top: On your current salary, it would take you {YEARS} years to earn {PLAYER_NAME}'s annual wage.
yearly_salary_bottom: If you started in the year {START_YEAR} you'd almost be finished.
yearly_salary_bottom_bc: If you started in the year {START_YEAR} BC, you'd almost be finished.
avg_compare_languages: Your wage is {COUNTRY_VALUE} % of the average wage in your country and {WORLD_VALUE}% of the world average wage.
avg_compare_english: Your wage is {COUNTRY_VALUE} the average wage in your country and {WORLD_VALUE} the world average wage.
shirt_player: {PLAYER_NAME}'s yearly salary is equivalent to the cost of {NUM_SHIRTS} {CLUB_NAME} replica shirts with '{PLAYER_SURNAME}' printed on the back.
minutes_earn_world_avg: {PLAYER_NAME} earns {ANNUAL_SALARY} per year. It would take him {NUM_MINUTES} minutes on the pitch to earn the global average weekly salary.
minutes_earn_world_avg_manager: {PLAYER_NAME} earns {ANNUAL_SALARY} per year. It would take him {NUM_MINUTES} minutes in the dugout to earn the global average weekly salary.
yearly_salary_gobal_avg_top: Someone earning the global average salary would take {YEARS} years to earn {PLAYER_NAME}'s annual wage.
yearly_salary_gobal_avg_bottom: If they'd started in the year {START_YEAR}, they’d almost be finished
minutes_earn_manager: {PLAYER_NAME} earns {ANNUAL_SALARY} per year. It would take him {NUM_MINUTES} minutes in the dugout to earn your weekly salary
shirt_manager: {PLAYER_NAME}'s yearly salary is equivalent to the cost of {NUM_SHIRTS} {CLUB_NAME} training tracksuits. However he usually prefers suits.
